1.name: Gamification and motivation
1.description: Ratings, badges, and an internal ’Wall of Honor’ to encourage people to improve performance rather than fear punishment.

2.name: Personalized
2.description: The system praises the employee and suggests what could be improved: «Good job offering coffee, but don’t forget the combo discount.»

3.name: Set up in a few minutes
3.description: Just place the GIDEONE device in the checkout area and register in the system — it’s that simple!

4.name: Criteria configuration
4.description: You can configure multiple sales scenarios, including key phrases, upselling, promotions, and target products — everything your staff needs to follow.
